• Back to overview
mcode Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.core

Element Dosage

Documentation:

The dosage of the medication. The data structure is flexible and can describe a dosage prescribed, administered, or reported.

Ancestors:
  • Dosage
Used By:
  • MedicationAction, 
  • MedicationAdministration, 
  • MedicationDispense, 
  • MedicationRequest, 
  • MedicationStatement

      A timing schedule that specifies an event that may occur multiple times. Timing offers a choice of multiple OccurrenceTime (used is used to specify specific times), or recurrence patterns.

      AsNeeded

      Preconditions for service, either 'true' indicating to be performed if needed, or a code indicating the pre-condition for performing the service. For example 'pain', 'on flare-up', etc.
